meanings.definition: A word or phrase preceded by a hash or pound sign (#) used on social media to identify messages on a specific topic.
meanings.sent1: I always use a hashtag when posting about my favorite TV show on social media.
meanings.sent2: The hashtag #ThrowbackThursday is popular for sharing old photos online.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hashtag refuse to work? It had too many followers!
meanings.sent4: The hashtag acted like a spotlight, shining on the trending topics.
meanings.sent5: The hashtag was like a label that made my post easy to find.

meanings.definition: To add a hashtag to a message on social media.
meanings.sent1: Remember to hashtag your post so more people can see it.
meanings.sent2: I will hashtag my photo with relevant keywords to reach a larger audience.
meanings.sent3: Why did the social media expert always carry a hashtag? To stay trending!
meanings.sent4: She hashtagged her thoughts, making them stand out in the sea of posts.
meanings.sent5: The act of hashtagging felt like planting a flag in the digital world.
